channel.title: How do i find menu button ids?
channel.description:
I have a one track mind, until i figure this out i cannot move on, ive been on it for a week and tried all i can. you make menu buttons work by putting their id in a case in case 185 in the parseincomingpackets void, but i dont know how to get the id. i tried a loop, but case ids cant be variable. i made a case generator and added parseincomingpackets2 and tried 30000 cases but the button still never did anything. the interface is 12624, there is a close button, left button, and ok button. they all say ok in the top right when highlighted. the numbers mopar sais next to em doesnt work. please 1. explain how to find ids or 2. tell me the ids so i can move on
Thanks for reading.

item.title: How do i find menu button ids?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

na i ment the button id list, i got the interface one, and thanks so much puppy boy, it worked, and i can move on to finish fixing my server now ^^

Read full topic

item.source: How do i find menu button ids?

item.title: How do i find menu button ids?
item.dc:creator: @puppy_boy puppy boy
item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

you could make the server printout the caseid wen its received…
this way you can get the incomeing packets when you need to
put this in parseIncomingPackets

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))
{
System.out.println("PacketType: "+packetType);
}

and to find the action button in case185
put this in case 185

	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")){
				misc.println("Case 185: Action Button: "+actionButtonId);
	}

tho that shouldve been in there already

Read full topic
